statements: SELECT * FROM approved_suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM approved_suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM approved_suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_location FROM approved_suppliers WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM approved_suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_location FROM approved_suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, supplier_id FROM approved_suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM approved_suppliers WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM approved_suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM approved_suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM approved_suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM approved_suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, price FROM approved_suppliers AS s INNER JOIN approved_products AS p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id WHERE price < 100;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, location FROM approved_suppliers WHERE location='New York';
SELECT * FROM approved_products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM approved_suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM approved_suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;

SELECT supplier_name, product_name, price FROM approved_suppliers JOIN approved_products ON approved_suppliers.supplier_id = approved_products.supplier_id WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY supplier_name, price DESC;

SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM approved_suppliers LEFT JOIN approved_products ON approved_suppliers.supplier_id = approved_products.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING COUNT(product_id) > 1 ORDER BY total_products DESC;

SELECT supplier_name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM approved_suppliers JOIN approved_products ON approved_suppliers.supplier_id = approved_products.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING avg_price > 50 ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM approved_suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM approved_suppliers WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, total_amount FROM purchase_orders JOIN products ON purchase_orders.product_id = products.product_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM approved_suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM approved_suppliers WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT supplier_name, product_name, total_amount FROM approved_suppliers JOIN products ON approved_suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id JOIN purchase_orders ON products.product_id = purchase_orders.product_id WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(products.product_id) AS total_products FROM approved_suppliers LEFT JOIN products ON approved_suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING COUNT(products.product_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM ApprovedSuppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM ApprovedSuppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM ApprovedProducts WHERE price > 50;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, total_price FROM Purchases WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT supplier_name, address, phone_number FROM ApprovedSuppliers;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM ApprovedProducts ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Purchases WHERE quantity > 10 AND total_price > 100;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY username ASC;

SELECT supplier_name, product_name, purchase_date, total_price FROM ApprovedSuppliers JOIN ApprovedProducts ON ApprovedSuppliers.supplier_id = ApprovedProducts.supplier_id JOIN Purchases ON ApprovedProducts.product_id = Purchases.product_id ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM Products WHERE supplier_id = 2 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM Categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM Orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT p.product_name, p.price, s.supplier_name FROM Products p JOIN Suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT c.category_name, COUNT(pc.product_id) AS product_count FROM Categories c LEFT JOIN ProductCategories pc ON pc.category_id = c.category_id GROUP BY c.category_name;
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, p.product_name, o.quantity FROM Orders o JOIN Products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY o.order_date DESC, o.quantity ASC;
